title: AI Compute Timeline
description: Training FLOPs milestones for AI history, from vacuum tubes to frontier models (1900-2026).

fields.Category: Era category (Early Compute, Neural Nets, Deep Learning, etc.)
fields.Impact: Historical impact level (Transformative, High, Medium, Speculative)

sources.name: Epoch AI
sources.notes: Primary source for training compute estimates

transformations: Log10(FLOPs) for y-axis. Pre-2010 estimates are approximate (dashed line region).
author: mschwar
